channel.title: Help please 317/java
channel.description:
well yeah so im trying to click run server so it loads the cmd batch,and closes in under a sec so i click edit and this what pops up any ideas on how to fix? i have jdk 6 -17 if that helps
[URL=http://img684.imageshack.us/i/problemw.png/][IMG]http://img684.imageshack.us/img684/2879/problemw.th.png[/img][/URL][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 27, 2009, 04:50:19 pm[/size][hr]please ppl :+) i cant set up a server without running server?????

item.title: Help please 317/java
item.dc:creator: @Espeon Espeon
item.description:
@Espeon wrote:

Make sure you set your environment variables correctly.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please 317/java
item.dc:creator: @Unruling Unruling
item.description:
@Unruling wrote:

@echo off
title ServerName
java -Xmx500m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Try That ^^

If not try this .

@echo off
title ServerName
COLOR 29
cd Source/Bin
java -Xmx512m Server
pause

Read full topic
